alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 6:17PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN WARREN, NORTHWESTERN CLINTON AND SOUTHERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EST... At 617 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from Cedarville to near Bellbrook, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Rapidly changing visibility and up to half an inch of snow accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Driving conditions may change quickly. Slick roads are possible. Locations impacted include... Xenia, Cedarville, Jamestown, Wilberforce, New Jasper, Harveysburg, Spring Valley, Bowersville, Port William, Paintersville, Rosemoor, Lumberton, Middleton Corner, Mount Holly, Roxanna, Oakland, Caesar Creek State Park, Kingman and Interstate 71 at US Route 68. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 42 and 61.
info.instruction: Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
